tools.name: create_calendar_event
tools.description: Creates a new event in the user's Google Calendar. IMPORTANT: Always ask for specific time and confirm attendees before calling. For meetings, dates, or social events, attendees are usually required.

start_time.description: REQUIRED: Start time in ISO format. If user doesn't specify time, ASK for it instead of assuming.

end_time.description: REQUIRED: End time in ISO format. If not specified, ask for duration or end time.

attendees.description: IMPORTANT: For meetings, dates, social events, or work events - ask for attendee email addresses. Don't create these events without checking if others should be invited.

tools.name: list_calendar_events
tools.description: Lists upcoming events from the user's Google Calendar

max_results.description: Maximum number of events to return (default: 10)

event_id.description: The ID of the event to update

start_time.description: New start time in ISO format

end_time.description: New end time in ISO format

event_id.description: The ID of the event to delete

tools.name: confirm_calendar_event
tools.description: Preview event details before creating. Use this to show user what will be created and get confirmation.

attendees.description: List of email addresses to invite
